translated: When will I go for alms?

original: rnyed dang bkur sti chags med cing //
analyzed: rnyed dang bkur sti chags med cing //
translated: Without attachment to gain and honor,

original: nyon mongs tsher ma'i 'dam rdzab dag / sbyor ba byed cing grong khyer gyi //
analyzed: nyon mongs tsher ma'i 'dam rdzab dag / sbyor ba byed cing grong khyer gyi //
translated: When will I become a worthy recipient of the city’s offerings,

original: sbyin pa'i gnas su nam zhig 'gyur //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i gnas su nam zhig 'gyur //
translated: while I am still in the swamp of afflictions and thorns?

original: rtsva yi tshogs las langs nas ni //
analyzed: rtsva yi tshogs las langs nas ni //
translated: When will I rise from the mass of grass🔽and, with a heavy garment of cow dung

original: ba mos lci ba'i gos dag dang // zas skom ngan ngon tsam gang gis //
analyzed: ba mos lci ba'i gos dag dang // zas skom ngan ngon tsam gang gis //
translated: and just a little food and drink,

analyzed: nam zhig lus la chags med 'gyur // shing drung ne tso ltar ljang ba'i //
translated: have no attachment to my body?🔽When will I be like a parrot, green

original: ngur pa 'jam po'i gos can du //
analyzed: ngur pa 'jam po'i gos can du //
translated: like the trees, wearing a soft garment of lotus fibers,🔽enjoying the feast of the happiness of this life,

original: mthong chos bde ba'i dga' ston dang // nam zhig @251b bdag ni nyal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: mthong chos bde ba'i dga' ston dang // nam zhig @251b bdag ni nyal bar 'gyur //
translated: and then go to sleep?

original: 'dor bar 'gyur ba'i lus srog la //
analyzed: 'dor bar 'gyur ba'i lus srog la //
translated: This body and life, which will be discarded,

original: chu dang rtsva yi zil pa ltar //🔽ltos med yun ring goms pa yi //
analyzed: chu dang rtsva yi zil pa ltar // ltos med yun ring goms pa yi //
translated: are like water and the dew on grass.🔽When will I attain great bliss,

original: bde ba chen po nam zhig 'thob //
analyzed: bde ba chen po nam zhig 'thob //
translated: which is independent and long-lasting?

original: nam zhig chu ngogs sman ljongs su //
analyzed: nam zhig chu ngogs sman ljongs su //
translated: When will I live on the bank of a river,🔽and again and again look at the rising and falling of the river

original: gnas nas chu ngogs 'byung 'jig dang // 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten gnas 'dra bar //
analyzed: gnas nas chu ngogs 'byung 'jig dang // 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten gnas 'dra bar //
translated: and the world of living beings, which is like this place?🔽When will I be like a swan,🔽white like a jasmine flower,🔽and with a neck raised high,

original: yang dang yang du lta bar 'gyur //🔽lta ba kun gyi mar gyur pa'i //
analyzed: yang dang yang du lta bar 'gyur //🔽lta ba kun gyi mar gyur pa'i //
translated: looking at the sky, which is like a second heaven?

original: 'jig tshogs lta ba 'byin pa dang // srid pa'i longs spyod mi 'dod par //
analyzed: 'jig tshogs lta ba 'byin pa dang // srid pa'i longs spyod mi 'dod par //
translated: and not desire the enjoyments of existence?

original: bdag ni nam zhig 'gyur zhig gu //
analyzed: bdag ni nam zhig 'gyur zhig gu //
translated: When will I be like that?

original: rmi lam smig rgyu sgyu ma sprin //
analyzed: rmi lam smig rgyu sgyu ma sprin //
translated: Like a dream, a mirage, an illusion, a cloud,

original: dri za'i grong khyer mtshungs par ni //
analyzed: dri za'i grong khyer mtshungs par ni //
translated: Like a city of the gandharvas,

original: rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten dag / nam zhig rtogs par byed par 'gyur //
analyzed: rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten dag / nam zhig rtogs par byed par 'gyur //
translated: when will I understand the world with its moving and unmoving beings?

original: ming po 'di ltar dga' ba yi //
analyzed: ming po 'di ltar dga' ba yi //
translated: Brother, with such delight,

original: re ba'i yid kyis rnam rol pas //🔽zang zing bcas shing g-yo ba yi //
analyzed: re ba'i yid kyis rnam rol pas // zang zing bcas shing g-yo ba yi //
translated: with a hopeful mind,

original: mchog de rnams kyis ci zhig bgyi //
analyzed: mchog de rnams kyis ci zhig bgyi //
translated: What will I do with those supreme enjoyments,🔽which are material and unstable?

original: kye ma mchog rab sbyin par sems gzhan yang //
analyzed: kye ma mchog rab sbyin par sems gzhan yang //
translated: Oh! The mind that gives the supreme,🔽even for a moment, a wrong conception,

original: log par rtog pa skad cig tsam 'ga' zhig / lha mgon 'dod pa ngo bo nyid kyis g-yo //
analyzed: log par rtog pa skad cig tsam 'ga' zhig / lha mgon 'dod pa ngo bo nyid kyis g-yo //
translated: is fickle by nature, like a protector god who desires the essence.🔽The supreme mind, vast and holy,🔽completely abandons it,

original: g-yang sa chen po mun nag bcas 'dra bas //🔽sems rgya che ba'i dam pas rnam par spangs //🔽mi rigs 'tshe ba kun gyi rgyur gyur cing //
analyzed: g-yang sa chen po mun nag bcas 'dra bas // sems rgya che ba'i dam pas rnam par spangs // mi rigs 'tshe ba kun gyi rgyur gyur cing //
translated: which is like a great abyss with darkness.🔽Desire is the cause of all improper harm,

original: 'dod pas mi rnams 'khrul par byed pas na //
analyzed: 'dod pas mi rnams 'khrul par byed pas na //
translated: and it confuses people.

original: 'di ni smad bya 'jigs pa chen po ste //
analyzed: 'di ni smad bya 'jigs pa chen po ste //
translated: This is a great object of contempt and fear,

original: mi gtsang bsgos pa'i sbrul nag dag dang mtshungs //
analyzed: mi gtsang bsgos pa'i sbrul nag dag dang mtshungs //
translated: Like a black snake smeared with filth.🔽This body of sentient beings, which has been moving from beginningless time,

original: gang 'di thog mtha' med nas 'gro ba dang // 'gro bar 'gyur dang gnas pa'i sems can lus //
analyzed: gang 'di thog mtha' med nas 'gro ba dang // 'gro bar 'gyur dang gnas pa'i sems can lus //
translated: Will move in the future and is moving now,

original: de ni gsod 'joms bstan dang mtshungs pas na //
analyzed: de ni gsod 'joms bstan dang mtshungs pas na //
translated: Is like a corpse or a clod of earth.

original: sdig pa'i gzhir gyur 'dod pas ci zhig bya //
analyzed: sdig pa'i gzhir gyur 'dod pas ci zhig bya //
translated: What wise person would desire it, the basis of evil?

original: lha dbang brgya byin 'dod pa'i yul 'di ni //
analyzed: lha dbang brgya byin 'dod pa'i yul 'di ni //
translated: This object of desire, O Indra,

original: phyag dar khrod 'drar byed 'dra'i ngo bo bas //
analyzed: phyag dar khrod 'drar byed 'dra'i ngo bo bas //
translated: Is like a rubbish heap, like a clod of earth.

original: brdzun par rtog cing rnam smin mi bzad pa'i //
analyzed: brdzun par rtog cing rnam smin mi bzad pa'i //
translated: It is false, and its fruition is unbearable.

original: 'dod pa yid kyis kyang ni su zhig bstan //🔽bee d'urya sngo ljang skyes pa yi rtsva dang ni //
analyzed: 'dod pa yid kyis kyang ni su zhig bstan // bee d'urya sngo ljang skyes pa yi rtsva dang ni //
translated: What wise person would even think of desire?🔽Abandoning the grass that grows in the blue-green beryl,

original: me tog rgyas par gyur pa'i shing gi nags spangs nas //
analyzed: me tog rgyas par gyur pa'i shing gi nags spangs nas //
translated: And the forest of flowering trees,

original: lcags kyu rnon pos spyi bor 'tshog cing 'dri ba dang // glang chen dbang pos khur skyed yul gyis bslus pa yin //
analyzed: lcags kyu rnon pos spyi bor 'tshog cing 'dri ba dang // glang chen dbang pos khur skyed yul gyis bslus pa yin //
translated: The elephant is struck on the head with a sharp hook, And deceived by the object of the burden of the lord of elephants.

original: mdung rtse lus bskyon grong gi kha yi tshogs rnams kyi //
analyzed: mdung rtse lus bskyon grong gi kha yi tshogs rnams kyi //
translated: The people of the town will see you impaled on a stake,

original: gshog pa'i @252a * //
analyzed: gshog pa'i @252a * //
translated: your body

original: rlung gis rab tu g-yob par byed 'gyur la //
analyzed: rlung gis rab tu g-yob par byed 'gyur la //
translated: flapping in the wind.

original: mdza' bo rnams kyang g-yo byas mig gis lta byed par //
analyzed: mdza' bo rnams kyang g-yo byas mig gis lta byed par //
translated: Your friends will look on with eyes of suspicion.

original: skyes bu 'jigs par 'gyur ba'ang yul gyis brlag pa yin //
analyzed: skyes bu 'jigs par 'gyur ba'ang yul gyis brlag pa yin //
translated: Even a man who is afraid will be destroyed by objects.

original: byis pa log rtog rlung gis rab 'bar 'dod pa yis //
analyzed: byis pa log rtog rlung gis rab 'bar 'dod pa yis //
translated: A fool, his desire fanned by the wind of false ideas,

original: rang nyid khang pa bdag nyid kyis ni sreg byed na //
analyzed: rang nyid khang pa bdag nyid kyis ni sreg byed na //
translated: burns down his own house.

original: smyig ma lo brgya lon pa phan tshun 'dar ba yis //
analyzed: smyig ma lo brgya lon pa phan tshun 'dar ba yis //
translated: Just as a hundred-year-old bamboo plant, shaking all around,

original: rang nyid kyis ni sreg par byed pa ji bzhin no //
analyzed: rang nyid kyis ni sreg par byed pa ji bzhin no //
translated: burns itself down.

original: brgya byin gzhan yang rnam rgyal khang par gnas nas ni //
analyzed: brgya byin gzhan yang rnam rgyal khang par gnas nas ni //
translated: Indra, furthermore, having lived in the palace of Victory,

original: 'od 'phro nor bu'i dpal gyis dga' ba 'di las ni //
analyzed: 'od 'phro nor bu'i dpal gyis dga' ba 'di las ni //
translated: with its splendor of shining jewels,

original: me chen rang 'bar 'jigs pa'i mnar med sar phyin pas //
analyzed: me chen rang 'bar 'jigs pa'i mnar med sar phyin pas //
translated: will go to the fearful Avīci hell, where a great fire burns by itself.

original: gang 'di dug can yul gyi bde ba de ni bde legs min //
analyzed: gang 'di dug can yul gyi bde ba de ni bde legs min //
translated: That pleasure which is poisoned by objects is not good.

original: mtho ris gnas nas 'gro ba ngan pa'i gnas 'jug cing //
analyzed: mtho ris gnas nas 'gro ba ngan pa'i gnas 'jug cing //
translated: It leads from the heavenly realms to the lower realms.

original: skad cig gis lhung 'pho ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba //🔽gang dag myong 'gyur lha yi 'jig rten mngon dga' ba //
analyzed: skad cig gis lhung 'pho ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba // gang dag myong 'gyur lha yi 'jig rten mngon dga' ba //
translated: They are tormented by the suffering of falling and shifting.

original: sngar myong gyur pa de ni bde ba myong ma yin //🔽gser gyi padma kha khyer ngang pa nyal ba dang // gang 'dir lha yi khang pa rdzing bur grul rgal ba dag /'dod pa'i las kyis slar yang mi ro rul pa yis //
analyzed: sngar myong gyur pa de ni bde ba myong ma yin // gser gyi padma kha khyer ngang pa nyal ba dang // gang 'dir lha yi khang pa rdzing bur grul rgal ba dag /'dod pa'i las kyis slar yang mi ro rul pa yis //
translated: Those who experience the world of the gods are not experiencing happiness.🔽The gods who sleep on golden lotuses with swans,🔽who cross over to the divine palaces and ponds here,🔽through the karma of desire, will again fall into the river Vaitaraṇi,

original: gzings pa'i chu bo rab med nang du ltung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: gzings pa'i chu bo rab med nang du ltung bar 'gyur //
translated: filled with rotting human corpses.

original: yongs su gyur na dga' bral rmi lam lta bu yi //
analyzed: yongs su gyur na dga' bral rmi lam lta bu yi //
translated: When they transform, they are like those who are separated from joy, like a dream.

original: lha rnams bde la de ni brgya byin su zhig 'dod //
analyzed: lha rnams bde la de ni brgya byin su zhig 'dod //
translated: Who would desire the happiness of the gods, which is like that of Śakra?

original: 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten khros pa'i sbrul gyis me ltar g-yo bar ni //
analyzed: 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten khros pa'i sbrul gyis me ltar g-yo bar ni //
translated: The world of living beings is like a fire-breathing snake, moving like a flame.

original: thams cad rtog pas bdag cag thar la gzhol ba gnas //
analyzed: thams cad rtog pas bdag cag thar la gzhol ba gnas //
translated: All of us who are devoted to liberation should contemplate this.

original: srid 'gro tshang tshing nang na gnas pa'i byis pa rnams //
analyzed: srid 'gro tshang tshing nang na gnas pa'i byis pa rnams //
translated: The childish who dwell in the thicket of cyclic existence,

original: 'di bde yin zhes pa de log par brtags tsam ste //
analyzed: 'di bde yin zhes pa de log par brtags tsam ste //
translated: think that this is happiness, but that is merely a misconception.

original: gang 'di srid pa ma lus sdug bsngal kun bskyed ces //
analyzed: gang 'di srid pa ma lus sdug bsngal kun bskyed ces //
translated: “This is the origin of all suffering in the world,”

original: yang dag gsungs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs //
analyzed: yang dag gsungs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs //
translated: So have the Buddhas taught.

original: 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten rang bzhin sdug bsngal mang pos g-yengs 'gyur te //
analyzed: 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten rang bzhin sdug bsngal mang pos g-yengs 'gyur te //
translated: The world of the living is distracted by many sufferings,

original: gang tshe 'di na bde ba myong ba'ang bya rog ta lar mtshungs //
analyzed: gang tshe 'di na bde ba myong ba'ang bya rog ta lar mtshungs //
translated: And even when it experiences pleasure, it is like a crow in a slaughterhouse.

original: de yang phrad gyur sdug bsngal du mas zil gyis gnon 'gyur te //
analyzed: de yang phrad gyur sdug bsngal du mas zil gyis gnon 'gyur te //
translated: And when it encounters suffering, it is overwhelmed by many sufferings,

original: chu bo'i chu ni rgya mtshor @252b phyin pa dag dang mtshungs //
analyzed: chu bo'i chu ni rgya mtshor @252b phyin pa dag dang mtshungs //
translated: Like the waters of a river that flow into the ocean.🔽The hands of women are like lotus petals,

original: gang phyir bud med lag pa ge sar bcas pa'i padma'i 'dab 'dra dang // gdu bu cung zad khrol ba tsan dan bsil bas bsgos par gyur pa yis //
analyzed: gang phyir bud med lag pa ge sar bcas pa'i padma'i 'dab 'dra dang // gdu bu cung zad khrol ba tsan dan bsil bas bsgos par gyur pa yis //
translated: And their bracelets, which are slightly loose, are perfumed with cool sandalwood.

original: reg cing zangs ltar dmar bcas sor mo zlum pas brtse pas 'khyud par byas pa dang // bsil yab rlung gi rgyan phreng gtor bas khyab par gnyid log gyur pa dag /'jag ma'i rtse mor bcer pa'i lam du thal ba dang 'dres rlung dmar ni //
analyzed: reg cing zangs ltar dmar bcas sor mo zlum pas brtse pas 'khyud par byas pa dang // bsil yab rlung gi rgyan phreng gtor bas khyab par gnyid log gyur pa dag /'jag ma'i rtse mor bcer pa'i lam du thal ba dang 'dres rlung dmar ni //
translated: But the wind, blowing on the path, naked at the end of the grass, mixes with the dust,

original: drag pos g-yob cing dub la lci ba'i lus kyi slar yang nyal 'gyur te /
analyzed: drag pos g-yob cing dub la lci ba'i lus kyi slar yang nyal 'gyur te /
translated: And, shaking the bodies, heavy with fatigue, it awakens them.

original: de bas 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten skad cig thang cig g-yo bar shes gyis la //
analyzed: de bas 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten skad cig thang cig g-yo bar shes gyis la //
translated: So know that the world of the living is moving in a moment, in an instant.

original: phongs pa'i 'bras 'byin 'dod pa spongs la tshams pa'i zhi la brten par gyis //
analyzed: phongs pa'i 'bras 'byin 'dod pa spongs la tshams pa'i zhi la brten par gyis //
translated: Abandon desire, which brings forth the fruit of misfortune, and rely on the peace of contentment.

original: de nas bu mo rnams la mig stong ldan //
analyzed: de nas bu mo rnams la mig stong ldan //
translated: Then, with his thousand eyes

original: dga' bas lus kyi ba spu ldang 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: dga' bas lus kyi ba spu ldang 'gyur zhing //
translated: The king of gods, filled with joy, his body hair bristling,

original: brtson la mngon dga'i sems dang lhan cig gis //
analyzed: brtson la mngon dga'i sems dang lhan cig gis //
translated: Together with his mind, which delights in exertion,

original: sum cu rtsa gsum mngon phyogs song bar gyur //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum mngon phyogs song bar gyur //
translated: Went to the heaven of the Thirty-Three.

original: de nas bu mo de rnams rab byung nyer son cing //
analyzed: de nas bu mo de rnams rab byung nyer son cing //
translated: Then, those girls, having approached the renunciate,

original: de nyid don la rnam brtag blo mig dgang gyur pas //🔽dregs pa'i chu rlabs g-yo zhing 'jigs par byed pa yi ;
analyzed: de nyid don la rnam brtag blo mig dgang gyur pas // dregs pa'i chu rlabs g-yo zhing 'jigs par byed pa yi ;
translated: The eye of the mind, which examines the meaning of reality, is opened,🔽And the waves of the ocean of suffering, which are stirred up by the fear of the turbulent mind,

original: / sdug bsngal mtsho chen mtha' med 'khor ba brgal bar gyur //
analyzed: / sdug bsngal mtsho chen mtha' med 'khor ba brgal bar gyur //
translated: Are crossed.

original: 'gro ba ma rig mdongs pa kun gyi mig gcig pa //
analyzed: 'gro ba ma rig mdongs pa kun gyi mig gcig pa //
translated: The only eye of all beings, who are blinded by ignorance,

original: rang bzhin 'gro don rnam byed nges pa'i bdag nyid kyi //
analyzed: rang bzhin 'gro don rnam byed nges pa'i bdag nyid kyi //
translated: Is the nature of the mind, which is the essence of the definite meaning,🔽And which is the agent of the welfare of beings.

original: thub pas sems can rnams la tshul 'di gsungs pas na //
analyzed: thub pas sems can rnams la tshul 'di gsungs pas na //
translated: Since the Sage has taught this to sentient beings,🔽May the thorns of the existence of sentient beings be destroyed.

original: sems can rnams kyi srid pa'i tsher ma zad par shog / gzhon nu ma bdun gyi rtogs pa brjod pa /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi srid pa'i tsher ma zad par shog / gzhon nu ma bdun gyi rtogs pa brjod pa /
translated: The Avadāna of the Seven Maidens

original: slob dpon gsang ba byin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: slob dpon gsang ba byin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: is completed.
